description:
At some point, Rin changed. Since she began to fear other people, she`ll only smile around children or Riki. Even Kyousuke has changed, shutting himself in his room with the lights off and refusing to attend classes. As children, the Little Busters were always laughing and having fun together, led by Kyousuke. Is there no way to go back to those days? "If there were something I could do to bring back those days, what would it be?"
Source: crunchyroll
